description: Purchase a PremiumDNS product for a certain DNS zone.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: DNS zone for which the PremiumDNS product is purchased
PremiumDNS order action:CREATE - create a PremiumDNS orderREPLACE - replace a PremiumDNS orderUPDATE - update a PremiumDNS order
PremiumDNS order ID; only relevant if ORDER is REPLACE or UPDATE
Renewal mode for the PremiumDNS product; possible values:AUTORENEWAUTOEXPIREIf not specified, the user's default renewal mode will be used
Creates the necessary dns zone before submitting application to the registry.
